tool.name: Drug Resistance Mutations
tool.command:
ln -f -s ${input_bam.metadata.bam_index} ${input_bam}.bai && quasitools drmutations $input_bam $ref_file $var_file $input_genes
#if $mutation_db: $mutation_db #end if
#if $min_freq: -f $min_freq #end if
#if $reporting_thres: -t $reporting_thres #end if
-o $output

param.name: mutation_db
param.label: Mutation DB
param.help: Not required. Defaults to HIV mutation db.

param.name: min_freq
param.label: Minimum frequency
param.help: The minimum required frequency. Defaults to 0.01.

param.name: reporting_thres
param.label: Reporting threshold
param.help: The minimum percentage required for an entry in the drug resistant report. Defaults to 1.

tool.help:
Drug Resistance Mutations =========================
Generates a report detailing the drug resistant mutations found, above the reporting threshold (default: 1%).
